member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementsModule
member.summary: This module is responsible for achievements You can create new achievements using the developers dashboard When you trigger the achievements the user can receive 4 types of rewards: 1. Coin currencies rewards - adds coins to users data 2. Virtual Items rewards - adds virtual items to users inventory 3. Progression rewards - adds progression points to users progression data (see GameProgressModule.GetUserProgressionDataAsync()) 4. Leaderboard score rewards - adds or sets leaderboard score for the user when achievement is triggered or claimed.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementsModule.GetByIdsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a list of achievements from the Ready Games Network (RGN) based on the provided achievements identifiers.
member.param: A list of application identifiers used to filter the achievements.
member.exception: Thrown when the provided ids list is null or empty.
member.returns: A Task representing the asynchronous operation. The Result property of the Task returns a list of objects representing the achievements that match the specified identifiers.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementsModule.GetByAppIdsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a list of achievements from the Ready Games Network (RGN) store based on the provided application identifiers.
member.param: A list of application identifiers used to filter the store offers.
An integer indicating the maximum number of achievements to retrieve.
An optional parameter representing an achievement id after which to start retrieving the achievements. The default is an empty string.
member.exception: Thrown when the provided appIds list is null or empty.
Thrown when the provided limit value is zero.
member.returns: A Task representing the asynchronous operation. The Result property of the Task returns a list of objects representing the achievements that match the specified application identifiers, limit and other optional parameters.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementsModule.GetForCurrentAppAsync(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a list of achievements for the current application from the Ready Games Network (RGN).
member.param: An integer indicating the maximum number of achievements to retrieve.
An optional parameter representing an achievement id after which to start retrieving the achievements. The default is an empty string.
member.exception: Thrown when the provided limit value is zero.
member.returns: A Task representing the asynchronous operation. The Result property of the Task returns a list of objects representing the achievements that match the current application identifier, limit and other optional parameters.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementsModule.GetByAppIdsWithUserDataAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a list of achievements from the Ready Games Network (RGN) based on the provided application identifiers. The user achievement data is also returned in case user made any progress with the given achievement
member.param: A list of application identifiers used to filter the store offers.
An integer indicating the maximum number of achievements to retrieve.
An optional parameter representing an achievement id after which to start retrieving the achievements. The default is an empty string.
An optional parameter to request the user achievements with the history entries. The default is false
member.exception: Thrown when the provided appIds list is null or empty.
Thrown when the provided limit value is zero.
member.returns: A Task representing the asynchronous operation. The Result property of the Task returns a list of objects representing the achievements that match the specified application identifiers, limit and other optional parameters.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementsModule.GetForCurrentAppWithUserDataAsync(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a list of achievements for the current application from the Ready Games Network (RGN). The user achievement data is also returned in case user made any progress with the given achievement
member.param: An integer indicating the maximum number of achievements to retrieve.
An optional parameter representing an achievement id after which to start retrieving the achievements. The default is an empty string.
member.exception: Thrown when the provided limit value is zero.
member.returns: A Task representing the asynchronous operation. The Result property of the Task returns a list of objects representing the achievements that match the current application identifier, limit and other optional parameters.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementsModule.GetByRequestNameAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves a list of achievements from the Ready Games Network (RGN) based on the provided achievement request name.
member.param: Request name to filter achievements.
member.exception: Thrown when the provided request name is null or empty.
member.returns: A Task representing the asynchronous operation. The Result property of the Task returns a list of objects representing the achievements that match the specified identifiers.

member.param: User id to return the completed achievements
The time stamp to start the query after

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData
member.summary: Represents achievement data from the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.id
member.summary: Achievement document id. To trigger an achievement the id is needed

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.appIds
member.summary: List of application ids where this achievement is used

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.requestName
member.summary: Achievement request name. This value can be used to query or trigger achievements

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.name
member.summary: Achievement name. This value can be null or empty

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.description
member.summary: Achievement description. This value can be null or empty

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.setBy
member.summary: Define who can trigger/claim the achievement

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.isClaimable
member.summary: Should the achievement be claim manually

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.valueToReach
member.summary: Value which should be reached to complete the achievement Default is 1

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.completedAchievementsToUnlock
member.summary: Achievement ids which should be completed before this achievement can be triggered

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.repeatable
member.summary: Can this achievement be applied multiple times to the same user account

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.repeatNoMoreOftenThanCron
member.summary: If this is provided, the the trigger for this achievement will work no more often that the specified cron string. * * * * * * ┬ ┬ ┬ ┬ ┬ ┬ │ │ │ │ │ | │ │ │ │ │ └ day of week(0 - 7, 1L - 7L) (0 or 7 is Sun) │ │ │ │ └───── month(1 - 12) │ │ │ └────────── day of month(1 - 31, L) │ │ └─────────────── hour(0 - 23) │ └──────────────────── minute(0 - 59) └───────────────────────── second(0 - 59, optional) You can use the https://crontab.guru/ to create cron settings

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.startTime
member.summary: Start time of the achievement, when it can be available for users in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Refer to for helper methods.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.endTime
member.summary: End time of the achievement, when it becomes unavailable for users in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Refer to for helper methods.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.resetTimeLimitEvery
member.summary: Define cron value when the achievement should reset. This parameter is used to update the and values. * * * * * * ┬ ┬ ┬ ┬ ┬ ┬ │ │ │ │ │ | │ │ │ │ │ └ day of week(0 - 7, 1L - 7L) (0 or 7 is Sun) │ │ │ │ └───── month(1 - 12) │ │ │ └────────── day of month(1 - 31, L) │ │ └─────────────── hour(0 - 23) │ └──────────────────── minute(0 - 59) └───────────────────────── second(0 - 59, optional) You can use the https://crontab.guru/ to create cron settings

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.rewards
member.summary: Achievement rewards ids and quantity rewards to add to users when the achievement is triggered

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.createdAt
member.summary: Time when the achievement was created in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Refer to for helper methods. This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.updatedAt
member.summary: Time when the achievement was updated in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Refer to for helper methods. This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.createdBy
member.summary: Creator user id This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementData.updatedBy
member.summary: Updater user id This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementReward
member.summary: This class represents the AchievementReward in the Ready Games Network (RGN) Unity SDK's AchievementsModule. An AchievementReward is a generic type of reward that can be earned by the user upon completing an achievement. This could be a Virtual Item, Currency Coins, Progression, or Leaderboard Score rewards depending on the `type`.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementReward.type
member.summary: The type of reward this achievement offers. This could be "virtualItem", "currency", "progression", "setLeaderboardScore" or "addLeaderboardScore" to match the different types of reward systems available.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementReward.appIds
member.summary: The list of application IDs for which this achievement reward is applicable. This allows rewards to be scoped to specific applications within a developer's portfolio.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementReward.name
member.summary: The name of the reward. This could be the id of the virtual item, currency name, progression id, or leaderboard id.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementReward.quantity
member.summary: The quantity of the reward that will be given to the user upon completing the achievement. For "virtualItem" and "currency", it represents the number of items or coins rewarded. For "progression", it represents the increment value for the user's progression. For "setLeaderboardScore", it represents the score that will be set for the current user to the leaderboard For "addLeaderboardScore", it represents the score that will be added for the current user to the leaderboard

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementWithUserData
member.summary: Represents achievement data from the backend

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Achievement.AchievementWithUserData.GetUserAchievement

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Achievement.TriggerAndClaimResponse.rewards
